Description: Muiska Leather Monica Double Top Zipper Slim Laptop Business Tote Bag, Black Muiska 100% Colombian Vaquetta Leather - Luxurious Fashion Design - High Quality Function Muiska's Colombian Vaquetta Leather Briefcases and Computer Bags are sophisticated and classy. The collection features a wide variety of styles for school or work as well as many items useful for all of your traveling needs. Whether you like a messenger bag, backpack, laptop bag, or briefcase to carry your files, documents and other essentials, or need a suitable travel duffle bag, garment bag, weekender, or travel kit for toiletries, you are sure to find the product that best fits your needs. The finest and highest quality top-grain Colombia Vaquetta cowhide leather and materials are hand selected to ensure that our exceptional quality is always maintained. Bold and distinctive hardware adds to the lasting beauty of our products. The smooth and flexible leather is easy to work with and maintain, as well as it is durable and strong for long lasting use. We are certain that you will love and appreciate our products. Thank you for being part of this tradition! SPECIFICATIONS: -All Genuine 100% Colombian Vaquetta Leather -Interior Fabric Lining -Stainless Steel Rust Resistant Hardware -Double stitched seams PRODUCT FEATURES: -Double Compartment Briefcase -First compartment has a zippered pocket that measures 9" x 7" for tablets, as well as pocket holder for smart phones, pen pockets and business cards slots -Second compartment is large enough for files and most medium 14" or below screen sized laptops, but is not padded -Adjustable leather shoulder strap with comfortable pad -Top padded double handle are long enough to wear over shoulder like a handbag -15" (L) x 12" (H) x 3" (W) 100% GENUINE COW LEATHER: Made from Full Grain Colombian Vaquetta Leather. Materials are carefully handpicked for condition and look to ensure quality products. Eco-friendly tanned without any toxins. Leather is smooth and flexible, yet durable and strong. It is easy to care for and upkeep, as well as handle when you are traveling. QUALITY MATERIAL: Handmade craftsmanship. Double stitched seams at the gussets. Interior fabric striped lining. Metal stainless steel zippers for a strong, long lasting use. Padded top handle for easy and comfortable grip. FUNCTIONALITY: Can accommodate laptop computers up to 15" in screen size. Features a sleeve compartment to keep your laptop safe and secured. Has various pockets and stationary holder slots to carry your belongings neatly and organized. Top double handles are wide enough to fit under arm, or you can use the detachable strap to carry it over your shoulder. FEATURES: The Monica Businesss Tote is a slim, lightweight bag that has two deep double compartments to organize your paperwork and devices, as well as stationary items with a zippered compartment for tablets, cell phone pocket, two pen holders, and a business card insert. Laptop sleeve. Has a detachable and adjustable shoulder strap wth padding. Comes with a branded dust bag to keep your bag protected. Dimensions: 15" (L) x 12" (H) x 3" (W).
